entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
